text: When you go to your favourite restaurant, after a hard long days of work and you take that first bite into your favourite meal, you feel great.

And when you get that promotion, that you have been eying at for couble of years already, you feel phenomenal.
But even when you open up your laptop, and you go on some raunchy website, and you masturbate to porn, you gonna feel good too.
These are all different types of rewards. But the thing about the active PMO:
watching porn, masturbating and eventually reaching orgasm, that seperates itself from the rest of the crowd is the fact that it dont really have to work for it.
It is virtually, effortless subtain.
Let´s put things in perspective.
In order to get that satisfying feeling that comes with getting a good grade,
You have to go to class.
You have to take semi decent notes
And eventually you have to study and take an exam.
This requires a significant amount of time and effort.

You open up your laptop

On top of that porn and masturbation trickers one of the most powerfull,
and pleasurefull rewards, your body can naturally give itself.
The orgasm.

See people who masturbate and watch porn a lot,
often report lower levels of motivation and energy.
This is because one of the most pleasurable things in nature is already in arms reach.
At a click of a button.
This group of individuals that has grown dramatically in the past couble of years, called nofap.
Its members try to resist enticements of porn and masturbation, that is literally blastered all over the place
in modern society.
The majority of its members will stop PMO for over 30 days

Increased levels of motivation

And increased confidence in social interactions.
See when you tell your body that no,
you only ever gonna get this tasty
beautiful, pleasurefull award,
if you actually go out there and earn it
your body will start to adjust and it becomes possible
Its gonna give you the energy and the motivation
that you need for that journey.
So stop rewarding yourself today, for doing absolutely nothing. And tou will see a change.

There´s other rewards out there, that have similar detrimental effect

Things like sugary foods, videogames, drugs and even alcohol.

And the reason the people of nofap,
Find themself on the path to success, over and over again.
or the path of abroad road

Its actually because they retaught themselves
how to put in time and effort before reaping the awards.
To put in work in order to succeed.

To meditate in order to feel happier and many examples.
What members of nofap are actually doing is they´re forcing themselves
to succeed, in order to feel pleasure.
When you award yourself for doing absolutely nothing

become just like that of a dog was given way too many treats
lazy and unmotivated.
So ask yourself this:
Am I rewarding myself, all the time for doing absolutely nothing?
